pages.text: 106|2|daesang-eulo hayeogeum gyeoulgwa yeoleum-e anjeonhage yeohaengke hayeossnola
106|3|geuleomeulo i jib-ui junim-eul geu deullo hayeogeum gyeongbaetolog hala
106|4|geubun-eun geudeul-eul gialobuteo baebullyeo jusyeossgo gongpolobuteo anjeonke hayeo jusyeossnola
107|4|wiseonjeog-in gidoleul haenghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
108|3|sillo geudaeui jeog-eun modeun huimang eulobuteo danjeoldoen jadeul-ila
